tool_description: Validates knowledge base articles for completeness, accuracy, formatting consistency, and adherence to style guidelines before publication.

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: Basic, Standard, or Comprehensive

content_type.description: Article type: FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference

style_guide_version.description: Version of style guide to validate against

check_links.description: Whether to validate internal and external links

required_sections.description: List of sections that must be present in the article

error_messages: Invalid validation level: Must be one of Basic, Standard, or Comprehensive
Invalid content type: Must be one of FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference
Empty content: Article content cannot be empty
Invalid style guide version: Specified version does not exist
Too many required sections: Maximum of 10 required sections allowed
usage: Provide article_content, validation_level, and content_type. Optionally specify style_guide_version, set check_links boolean, and provide required_sections array to ensure structural completeness.

validation_passed.description: Whether the article passed all validation checks

errors_found.description: List of validation errors that must be fixed

warnings.description: List of warnings for improvement suggestions

missing_sections.description: Required sections that are missing from the article

broken_links.description: List of broken or invalid links found
